Test Name: Histoplasma Antibody Complement Fixation (CF) and Immunodiffusion (ID)
Purpose: To detect and measure antibodies to Histoplasma capsulatum in spinal fluid using complement fixation and immunodiffusion techniques.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof tube for cerebrospinal fluid
Equipment: Water bath/incubator (37±1°C), microcentrifuge, microtiter plates, ID gel plates, pipettes
